item.description:
SinglesCT.com Comedy Nite at the Funny Bone Manchester Friday AUG 13 at 10pm + After party

Join SinglesCT.com at the Funny Bone Comedy Club at Buckland Hills Mall (rear entrance between Panera and Bertucci’s)

The Funny Bone gives us the best talent from around the country – not local amateur night comedians – in this new comedy club that was specially designed for comfort, safety, and to give you the best comedy experience available anywhere!

We will enjoy 3 comedians in a show that will last between 90 minutes and 2 hours – with waitresses bring us our choice of drink and food.

We picked the 10pm show because the late show is always better – the comedians are more relaxed and don’t have to worry about ending their set at a given time.

Our headliner will be TJ Miller who you may recognize from TV and Film

Advance Tickets are only $17 - Tickets are $25 if any space remains

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343

In the past year, T.J. Miller has shot Tony Scott's "Unstoppable" (Fox) opposite Denzel Washington and Chris Pine, "Gulliver's Travels" (Fox) opposite Jack Black and Jason Segel and "Get Him to the Greek" (Uni) for producer Judd Apatow, opposite Jonah Hill and Russell Brand. In March 2010, Dreamworks will release "She's Out of My League" in which T.J. co-stars. He recently had a supporting role in Mike Judge's "Extract" and has been cast opposite Steve Carell, Paul Rudd and Zach Galifianakis in "Dinner for Schmucks." He is also attached to a project at Paramount entitled "Freshman Roommates" starring Tracy Morgan.

Last fall he was named one of Variety's "10 Comics to Watch" as well as one of Entertainment Weekly's "Next Big Things in Comedy." Previously, he starred in the JJ Abrams produced feature "Cloverfield" for Paramount and Russo Brothers' show "Carpoolers" on ABC.

Funny Bone Comedy Club
194 Buckland Hills Drive
Manchester, CT 06040

After party will be down the street at John Harvards

The show starts at 10pm, please arrive early to meet the group and get your ticket. We will be sitting on the benches between The Funny Bone and Bertucci’s starting at 9:30pm.

If you have trouble finding us, call us at (860) 236-3343

We have a limited number of tickets available, so get your seat today before we sell out!

Advance Tickets are only $17 - Tickets are $25 if any space remains

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: FRI AUG 13 * SinglesCT.com Comedy Nite at the Funny Bone Manchester + Afterparty
